title: Godfrey of Bulloigne, or The recouerie of Hierusalem An heroicall poeme written in Italian by Seig. Torquato Tasso, and translated into English by R.C. Esquire: and now the first part containing fiue cantos, imprinted in both languages.
author: Tasso, Torquato, 1544-1595.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet for Thomas Man dwelling in Pater noster-Row,
